gameutils.gui
Class Button

java.lang.Object
  gameutils.gui.Widget
      gameutils.gui.Button
All Implemented Interfaces:
Element
public class Button
extends Widget

A Button extends Widget and draws a button. If you are confused with the usage of Paint, remember Color implements Paint so you can still a Color if you wish.

Author:
Roi Atalla

Nested Class Summary
static interface Button.Action
          This interface is in use mainly but the Button class.

Constructor Detail

Button

public Button(String text,
              int fontSize,
              int x,
              int y,
              int arcwidth,
              int archeight,
              boolean centered,
              Button.Action action)
Initializes this Button. The defaults are:
- text = black
- background = transparent,
- background highlight = half transparent white
- background pressed = half transparent light gray
- border = black
- border highlight = orange
- border pressed = dark gray,
- disabled = half transparent dark gray.

Parameters:
text - The text to show on the button.
fontSize - The font size of the text. The default font is Bold Sans-Serif.
x - The X position of the button.
y - The Y position of the button.
arcwidth - The arc width of each corner of the button.
archeight - The arc height of each corner of the button.
centered - If true, the X and Y are the center of the text, else they are the top left corner of the text.
action - The action to be called when this button is pressed.

setBackgroundGradient

public void setBackgroundGradient(Color bottom)
Convenience method to set a gradient background. The top color is white. Automatically sets the background pressed gradient Paint to a color darker than the specified one.

Parameters:
bottom - The bottom color of the gradient.

setBackgroundGradient

public void setBackgroundGradient(Color top,
                                  Color bottom)
Convenience method to set a gradient background. The top color is white. Automatically sets the background pressed gradient Paint to a color darker than the specified one.

Parameters:
top - The top color of the gradient.
bottom - The bottom color of the gradient.
